QuestData.Title: Implements of Ill Intent
QuestData.Description:
<It looks like some careless witch made a poor attempt to hide this grimoire from sight. No good could come of leaving the possessions of the coven for a hapless villager to find.
It would probably be a good idea to destroy any trappings of the coven that you find in Arom's Stand.>
QuestData.LogDescription: Destroy $1oa Heartsbane objects in Arom's Stand.
QuestData.RewardText: That was good thinking to dispose of the witches' trappings. $B$BI don't want to know what would happen if an innocent villager toyed around with such things!
